top knotch stuff man, top knotch!

Hello, alexustas, I am wondering whether this mod is still operational, because with 1.0.5 update the stock Mk1 Cockpit went through a redesign (and it looks quite cool, but needs more flashy lights) and I currently have not been able to use it, and since RPM is a dependancy that mod disables me from using the Mk1 Cockpit IVA. I might have installed it wrong, but here is the path: GameData>Squad>Parts>Command>ASET>ASETMK1DemoCockpit. If you are able to help, that would be very nice. I admire your work and hope it can be updated.

EDIT: I switched to 1.0.4 and it now works. It was amazing. Then I got a cockpit replacement for 1.0.5 that uses ASET and that was amazing too. You should use the Mk3 for a Boeing Cockpit, as that throttle quadrant is sooooo good, my Kerbals will enjoy using it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-30T05:30:49Z" title="03/30/2016 05:30  AM" data-short="8 yr">March 30, 2016</time> by >The Amazing Spy<**

These are prop mods and really don't need updating, only if to update the versioning. I am using these props in 1.1.3 and haven't had a problem with them that wasn't prevalent in previous versions. Just as long as you keep your RPM up to date, you're good to go. But, if you are curious on what's going on with these mods, [@alexustas](%7B___base_url___%7D/index.php?/profile/78632-alexustas/) and [@MOARdV](%7B___base_url___%7D/index.php?/profile/60950-moardv/) and company have been burning the midnight oil to bring new features on the RPM GitHub. I urge you to read up for yourself on the progress they are making.

>

> Yeah... where can we download this now?

For the time being, the last released version is available on [DropBox](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ahsmf7fzwijuj07/ASET_Avionics-1.0.zip?dl=0).  Once alexustas releases his updates to the prop packs, that link will go away.
